org.jgentleframework.context.beans.annotation
Annotation Type InitializingMethod

@Target(value=METHOD)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface InitializingMethod

This annotation is responsible for method designating in order to allow container to identify one method as Initializing Method. A Initializing Method is a method that is automatically invoked by JGentle container when corresponding bean is created.

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com
See Also:
DisposableMethod, Initializing, Disposable
